Name: Almond Old Fashioned (tequila based)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One to please fans of both tequila and the Old Fashioned cocktail genre with amaretto adding the headline hint of almond.
History: Created in 2005 by Mark Prat at Maze, London, England. See: Old-Fashioned cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Almond Old Fashioned (tequila based) contains 175 calories
